QueryResult.text: SELECT o.id, o.code, o.parent_object_code, o.source, o.obs_code, o.right_code, o.component, o.partition_model_code, o.is_partitionable, o.is_customizable, o.is_custom, o.is_process_enabled, o.is_obs_enabled, o.is_rights_enabled, o.raise_events, o.is_copy_enabled, o.is_odata_enabled, o.is_favorite_enabled, o.is_api_enabled, o.is_dw_enabled, o.is_dw_trend_enabled, o.is_system, o.is_class_enabled, o.is_export_enabled, o.is_view_all_enabled, o.is_status_report_enabled, o.is_audit_delete, o.is_audit_update, o.is_audit_insert, o.is_abstract, o.page_layout_attr, o.page_instance_type, o.purge_audit_days_old, o.is_allow_import, o.allow_custom_subobjects, o.is_fls_enabled, o.is_sharable, o.is_manual_sort_enabled, o.manual_sort_table_name, o.allow_custom_sub_obj_apialias, o.extensions, o.template_extension, o.api_alias, o.api_http_methods, o.created_date, o.last_updated_date, o.last_updated_by, nls.language_code, nls.name, nls.description FROM cmn_captions_nls nls, odf_objects o WHERE nls.table_name = 'ODF_OBJECTS' AND nls.pk_id = o.id
